```{r setup}
library(rlgd)
library(parallel)
library(caret)
library(formula.tools)
```


```{r}
data("breast_cancer")
breast_cancer
```


```{r}
set.seed(10)
train_index <- createDataPartition(breast_cancer$classe, p = 0.7, list = F)
train_set <- breast_cancer[train_index, ]
test_set <- breast_cancer[-train_index, ]
```


```{r}
get_x_y(classe~.,breast_cancer,standardize = TRUE)
```


```{r}
res <- rlgd.fit(formula = classe~., data = breast_cancer, mode = "batch", learning_rate = 0.01, max_iter = 1000, tol = 1e-4, standardize = TRUE)
```

```{r}
res
```
